description: This file contains widget tests for a Flutter application implementing Tic Tac Toe. It includes test cases to verify rendering of UI elements like headers, score displays, turn indicators, and grid cells, as well as interaction by simulating taps on the game grid.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point for widget testing; runs two testWidgets functions to verify UI rendering and interaction of the TicTacToe Flutter app.
